body.name: HUIJUTCHEN Mini Sticker Printer - Mini Pocket Printer for iPhone Thermal Printer with 10 Rolls Thermal Paper for Journal, Memo, Photo, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 23 hrs 12 mins
features: 3 Ways to download print app "Fun Print" ---①Scan the QR code in the included manual. ② Search "Fun Print" in google play , ③Search "Fun Print" in the App Store. You can turn on the wireless sticker printer and open the bluetooth on your phone, open the "funprint" app and connect to "MX06" device.

Inkless Mini Sticker Printer --- Our wireless mini thermal printer measures 3.1x3.1x1.5 inch, weight 5.3oz, small size enough to carry with you anywhere. Our mini pocket printer is a thermal printer which doesn’t need ink, so that you can print anything you want at anytime. Built-in rechargeable battery supports about 800 times print through one-time full charge, which is more convenient for your use.

Multifunctional Print App “funprint’ --- This mini bluetooth printer’s app has many templates, such as holiday themed templates, such as Easter, Halloween, Christmas, other templates like animals, entertainments, letters, characters, plants, foods and so on, very versatile to meet your diverse needs.

Multipurpose Uses --- You can choose pictures from your phone album, write your text, or make labels, journals, notes, barcode, QR codes, receipt, etc. Kids can use this inkless pocket printer to print blank templates, fill color to exercise their imagination, also can use it to print learning materials or study notes. Parents can use this mini portable printer to organize shopping/to do lists, work plans or more, a great tool for all ages.

10 Rolls Of Thermal Paper --- The wireless mini photo printer comes with 1x mini thermal printer, 1x charging cable, 5x rolls of normal thermal papers (2.2’’ wide), 5x rolls of sticky papers. It is great set with large quantities of thermal paper, which is enough for your daily use and help you save money.
body.description: Please tear it in a right way tear it downwards you can use your left hand to hold the mini printer as picture, with the power button on left up direction, then use your right hand to tear it in a downward way, so that you can get a flat cut. This inkless mini printer package comes with 1 portable mini printer, 10 rolls of 5 ordinary thermal paper and 5 sticker papers with 2.2" wide, 1 USB cable and 1 user guide, which is a great set to meet your diverse needs and they are enough for family use. Any questions about the mini bluetooth printer, please tell us for help.

This lovely pink color will be loved by your girls.
This inkless pocket printer is perfect for printing black and white pictures/photos, shopping lists, memos, study/meeting notes, business and work plans, web pages.

Compatible Type This note printer supports IOS & Android system, so you can use it freely. Right Way to Place Paper please follow the picture to place roll paper Type C USB Charging Cable your mini portable printer for iphone will be quickly charged by this charging cable

This inkless mini printer package comes with 1 portable mini printer, 10 rolls of 5 ordinary thermal paper and 5 sticker papers with 2.2" wide, 1 USB cable and 1 user guide, which is a great set to meet your diverse needs and they are enough for family use. Any questions about the mini bluetooth printer, please tell us for help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was worth every penny and now I'm going to buy a second one! My son and I played and printed for hours! One idea led to another and now we found so many uses and projects to use this with!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Even though it's like a toy for children is so cute, great printing quality. I ordered some transparent thermal paper as well and the results are amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mini printer
reviews.reviewText: I love this little printer!! It is so cute and compact. It definitely gets the job done.I use this Mini thermal Printer to print Labels and stickers for my business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG!!!! Perfect for presents & name tags.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this printer to make me some small labels to put on some of my items that I carry back-and-forth to work. To my great surprise, I found even a better use when I started making them for all of my coworkers and family. With the new trend of putting labels on water bottles, water cups, laptops, and any and everything else this has been a total hit. Everyone has enjoyed having personalized items with cute little pics next to their name. I’m really impressed with the quality of the sticker. The stickers seem to stick without any problem. The only downside is I’m probably gonna have to order a whole lot more of the sticker paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We used to love using Polaroid cameras, but everything transitioned to digital, and we never seem to go back and view our pictures anymore; they sit in the cloud. I felt nostalgic and decided to purchase this. It's been so much fun. Honestly, this is such a great gadget. I can be mindful and present, and I'm not worried about getting the perfect angle but instead focusing on the moment.
